charinfo.name: Omoi (S)
charinfo.description: Omoi (S) is a Hidden Cloud Village shinobi and a student of Killer Bee. Having been trained by Killer Bee, naturally he is an exceptional swordsman.

abilities.name: Crescent Moon Reverse Beheading
abilities.description: Omoi (S) uses Crescent Moon Reverse Beheading. The following turn all enemies that use a skill on Omoi (S) will be countered and dealt 20 piercing damage. This skill becomes Crescent Moon Beheading when used. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Lightning Charged Sword
abilities.description: Using Lightning Charged Sword Omoi (S) targets one enemy dealing 25 damage while stunning their friendly skills the following turn.

abilities.name: Paper Trap
abilities.description: Omoi (S) uses Paper Trap on himself or one ally. The first enemy to use a skill on the target of this skill will be dealt 20 damage that ignores invulnerability. This skill stacks. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Kenjutsu Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Omoi (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
